full_output.summary: I am an Information Technology undergraduate at Manipal University Jaipur with a solid grounding in programming, web development, and data science. As the Head of Research at my universitys computing club, I have honed my leadership skills and successfully organized several technical events. My expertise includes Python, C++, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I have completed practical projects in machine learning, e-commerce development, and data analysis. I am eager to leverage my skills and experience in a dynamic tech role.

certifications.title: 100 Days of Code: The Complete Python Pro Bootcamp

projects.name: Simple Scientific Calculator
projects.description: Developed a Python-based scientific calculator to perform various mathematical operations. Implemented functions for basic arithmetic operations (+, -, *, /) and expanded functionality to include scientific operations.

projects.name: Diabetes Prediction Using SVM
projects.description: Implemented a machine learning project to predict diabetes using Python and Support Vector Machines. Collected and pre-processed a dataset containing health-related features and the target variable. Trained an SVM model with optimized hyperparameters, achieving high accuracy on test data.

projects.name: Shoe Management Website
projects.description: Developed a dynamic e-commerce website for managing shoe inventory and processing customer orders. Designed and implemented a SQL database schema to store product information, user profiles, and order history. Built front-end interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.name: House Price Prediction Using Regression
projects.description: Built a machine learning model to predict house prices based on features such as area, number of bedrooms, and location. Utilized Python libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and scikit-learn for data preprocessing and model training. Implemented and compared multiple regression algorithms, including Linear, Ridge, and Lasso Regression.

full_output.name: Varada Prasad Mantrawadi
